meanings.sent1: She upholds her friend when they feel sad.
meanings.sent2: The strong pillar upholds the roof of the house.
meanings.sent3: The superhero upholds justice in the city.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of trust upholds their relationship.
meanings.sent5: His unwavering loyalty upholds his values.

meanings.sent1: The evidence upholds his innocence in the case.
meanings.sent2: The results of the experiment upholds the theory.
meanings.sent3: The stamp on the document upholds its authenticity.
meanings.sent4: Her actions upholds the company's reputation.
meanings.sent5: The witness testimony upholds the defendant's alibi.
